page.title: 16HOME LIFE: Lepton
page.content: We interviewed a lady who is 84 years old. She came to live in the village when she was married, and has {lived there for 63 years.}Her father was born in the village. He had a farm before the bungalows were built. He had all the fields which have now been built on. The look of the village has changed a lot. It was very small and friendly, but now{lots of people have come from {outside.}Some of the change has been good. The old barns and derelict buildings have been pulled down. Many cottages have been improved and renovated. The village becomes noisy at night when young people are on the street corners. Also, people make a noise coming out of the pubs. But still, it's a nice place to live in.
